section.10: The Book of Leading the Prayer (Al-Imamah)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Abdul Hamid bin Mahmud said:"We were with Anas and we prayed with one of the Amirs. They pushed us until we stood and prayed between two rows, and Anas started moving backward and said: 'We used to avoid this at the time of the Messenger of Allah (ï·º)
